summary: It's up to the Justice League to team up with their bizarre counterparts to stop Darkseid and save the galaxy!
cast: Diedrich Bader|Troy Baker|John DiMaggio|Tom Kenny|Phil Morris|Nolan North|Khary Payton|Kevin Michael Richardson|James Arnold Taylor|Tony Todd|Kari Wahlgren|April Winchell
keywords: outer space|justice league|bizarro character|batman character|bruce wayne character
title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: La Liga de la Justicia vs. la Liga Bizarro
